options.option4: d) Amazon FSx for Windows File Server

options.option1: a) Use EC2 reserved instance for the production and spot instances for the dev
options.option2: b) Use EC2 reserved instance for the production and spot block intances for the dev
options.option3: c) Use EC2 reserved instance for the production and on-demand instances for the dev
options.option4: d) Use only EC2 on-demand instaces for the production and dev
options.option5: e) Use on-demand EC2 instances for the production and spot intances for the dev
